articles.description: A new study suggests long periods in space can cause the human heart to shrink. The study, by a team of American researchers, comes as the U.S. makes plans to build a long-term base on the moon and prepares to send astronauts to Mars.
articles.title: Study: Long Periods in Space Can Shrink the Heart - VOA Learning English
